statements: UPDATE predictive_modeling_data SET quantity = 10, price = 25.99 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE predictive_modeling_data SET price = price * 1.1, quantity = quantity + 1 WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE predictive_modeling_data SET item_name = 'New Item', risk_assessment = 'High', date = '2022-08-15' WHERE price > 100;
UPDATE pricing_model SET pricing_estimate = 1000.50, risk_assessment = 'High' WHERE id = 1;
